debut.context: First anime appearance (excluding opening) as a background member of the Black Cat Pirates

keyMoments.description: Pandaman makes his first appearance in the One Piece anime (excluding the opening theme 'We Are!'). He appears as a member of the Black Cat Pirates during the battle at the northern coast of Syrup Village.

reveals.description: Pandaman debuts as an easter egg character in the anime, beginning his tradition of appearing as a background character throughout the series.

keyMoments.description: Kaya flees through the forest with the Usopp Pirates as Jango hunts her down, but her illness makes it difficult to continue.
Kaya agrees to sign her will over to Klahadore (Kuro) in exchange for Jango sparing the lives of the Usopp Pirates, demonstrating her selfless and caring nature.
Zoro and Usopp arrive just in time to save Kaya from being killed by Jango after she signs the will.

reveals.description: Kaya demonstrates her noble and selfless character by willingly sacrificing her fortune and life to save the Usopp Pirates from Jango.

relationships.status: Piiman risks his life to protect Kaya
Tamanegi risks his life to protect Kaya
Ninjin risks his life to protect Kaya
Usopp arrives to save Kaya from Jango
Zoro helps rescue Kaya from Jango

keyMoments.description: Kuro reveals his plan to kill all of the Black Cat Pirates as part of his scheme, showing complete disregard for his crew's loyalty and lives.
Kuro unleashes his ultimate technique, Shakushi, for the first time. He moves at incredible speed, slashing everything indiscriminately including his own crew members.

reveals.description: Kuro demonstrates his ultimate technique, Shakushi (Scoop Death), which allows him to move at approximately 100 meters in 4-5 seconds and attack everything in his path indiscriminately.
Kuro's complete lack of loyalty is revealed as he announces his plan to kill his entire crew, showing his cold and calculating nature.

abilities.name: Shakushi
abilities.description: Kuro's ultimate technique that utilizes his incredible speed to move at approximately 100 meters in 4-5 seconds, allowing him to slash everything in a large area indiscriminately.
abilities.limitations: Cannot control who or what he attacks - hits enemies, allies, and surroundings randomly. Can only stop when he becomes tired or is physically stopped.

relationships.status: Kuro battles Luffy using his Shakushi technique

keyMoments.description: Jango pursues Kaya through the forest, hunting her down to force her to sign the will.
Jango easily defeats the Usopp Pirates' ambush attempt, showing the vast difference in power between him and the children.
Jango threatens to kill the Usopp Pirates, forcing Kaya to agree to sign the will to save their lives.
Zoro and Usopp arrive just as Jango is about to kill Kaya, forcing him into a confrontation.

relationships.status: Jango pursues and threatens Kaya to force her to sign the will
Usopp confronts Jango to protect Kaya
Zoro prepares to fight Jango to save Kaya

keyMoments.description: Piiman helps escort Kaya through the forest while fleeing from Jango.
Piiman participates in the Usopp Pirates' ambush attempt against Jango, showing bravery despite being outmatched.
Piiman faces Jango's death threats but is saved when Kaya agrees to sign the will.

reveals.description: Piiman demonstrates courage and loyalty by attempting to protect Kaya from Jango despite being just a child facing a dangerous pirate.

keyMoments.description: Tamanegi helps escort Kaya through the forest while fleeing from Jango.
Tamanegi participates in the Usopp Pirates' ambush attempt against Jango.
Tamanegi is threatened with death by Jango but is saved when Kaya agrees to sign the will.

reveals.description: Tamanegi shows bravery and loyalty by standing up to Jango to protect Kaya.

keyMoments.description: Ninjin helps escort Kaya through the forest while fleeing from Jango.
Ninjin participates in the Usopp Pirates' ambush attempt against Jango.
Ninjin is threatened with death by Jango but is saved when Kaya agrees to sign the will.

reveals.description: Ninjin demonstrates courage and loyalty by attempting to protect Kaya despite the danger.

keyMoments.description: Usopp arrives with Zoro to save Kaya from Jango, positioning himself between her and danger.

reveals.description: Usopp continues his transformation from coward to hero by confronting the dangerous Jango to protect Kaya.

keyMoments.description: Zoro arrives with Usopp to rescue Kaya from Jango just in time.
Luffy struggles to fight against Kuro's incredible speed as the Shakushi technique proves difficult to counter.
